data.name: CFS  - Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest: Big Data & Analytics Conference
data.description: Postponed until October 9th. Corona virus update - Out of abundance of caution, we are re-scheduling the 2020 Reston Azure Data Fest until Friday, October 9, 2020. The location of the event will still be the same. We might add a second day to the event, or schedule some type of Azure event in Augâ€¦
